# Question 2 US State Capitols

```{r}
capitals <- read.table("state_capitals_ll.txt")
names <- read.table("state_capitals_name.txt")

capital_data <- full_join(capitals, names, by = "V1") |>
  rename(lat = V2.x, 
         lng = V3)

# US capitals map 
leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(lng = -98.5795,
          lat = 39.8283,
          zoom = 3) |>
  addMarkers(data = capital_data, 
             popup = capital_data$V2.y)
```
